entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
